fields.label: Compass placement
fields.tooltip: When enable, this will provide users the ability to view the orientation of the map and reorient toward the north.

fields.label: Basemap Gallery
fields.tooltip: When enable, this will provide users the ability to change the background of the map or scene.

fields.label: Enable Seach capabilities
fields.tooltip: When enable, this will provide users the ability to search for places.

fields.label: Enable Geolocation button on the map
fields.tooltip: When enable, this will provide users to find their location on the map or scene.

fields.label: Include a Legend on the map
fields.tooltip: When enable, this will add a legend to the map allowing users to interpret the symbology used.

fields.label: Enable Home button on the map
fields.tooltip: When enable, this will provide users the ability to navigate to the default extent of a map or scene.

fields.label: Filter by organization categories instead of group
fields.tooltip: If enabled, will use the organization's categories instead of those associated with the group. Note that organization categories are only available for signed-in organizational users. They will not be visible for public users.

fields.label: Items shown per page
fields.tooltip: Control the ways items filters presented to users in the gallery.Controls how many results are returned per query to the portal Search API. This is equivalent to how many items are shown per page.
